param.name: uuid
param.doc: Unique identifier of the database object, which can be retrieved by using the GET request.

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: To unconfigure database for your appliance with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP DELETE request on the database resource URI.

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.
